Renaming Version Manager Projects

You can rename a project to change the name displayed for all Users.

To rename a project:

  1. In the Project pane, select the project you want to rename.

  2. Select File | Rename. The Rename dialog box appears. For more information on what characters should not be used in Version Manager names, see Naming Conventions.

  3. Enter a new project name in the Name field.

  4. Click OK.
